component.name: GKrellM
component.summary: Monitor for CPU, memory, disks, network, mail

description.p: GKrellM is a single process stack of system monitors which supports applying themes to match its appearance to your window manager, Gtk, or any other theme.

ul.li: Temperature, fan, and voltage sensor monitors
Process monitor with a chart for load and forks
Display of number of current processes and users
Disk monitor that can chart individual disks or a composite disk
Net interface monitors, Data rx/tx LEDs
